title: Emerging-Market Currencies, Stocks Edge Up in Holiday Trading
description: Gauges for developing-nation currencies and stocks edged higher in thin trading on Monday amid holidays in key markets, with expectations of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts supporting riskier assets.
content: Gauges for developing-nation currencies and stocks edged higher in thin trading on Monday amid holidays in key markets, with expectations of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts supporting riskier assets.
